verses.verse: Surely <S%H3426><s%> there is a <S%H4161>mine<s%> for <S%H3701>silver<s%>, And a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%> which they <S%H2212>refine<s%>.
Iron <S%H1270><s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of the <S%H6083>earth<s%>, And <S%H5154>copper<s%> is <S%H6694>molten<s%> out of the <S%H68>stone<s%>.

Man <S%H7760>setteth<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, And searcheth <S%H2713>out<s%>, to the furthest <S%H8503>bound<s%>, The <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H652>obscurity<s%> and of thick <S%H6757>darkness<s%>.

He breaketh <S%H6555>open<s%> a <S%H5158>shaft<s%> away from where men <S%H1481>sojourn<s%>; They are <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%>; They <S%H1809>hang<s%> <S%H5128>afar<s%> from <S%H582>men<s%>, they swing to and fro.
As for the <S%H776>earth<s%>, out of it <S%H3318>cometh<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>; And underneath it is turned <S%H2015>up<s%> as it were by <S%H784>fire<s%>.
The <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof are the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphires<s%>, And it hath <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
That <S%H5410>path<s%> no <S%H5861>bird<s%> of prey <S%H3045>knoweth<s%>, Neither hath the <S%H344>falcon<s%>'s <S%H5869>eye<s%> seen <S%H7805>it<s%>:
The <S%H7830>proud<s%> <S%H1121>beasts<s%> have not <S%H1869>trodden<s%> <S%H7826>it<s%>, Nor hath the fierce lion passed <S%H5710>thereby<s%>.
He putteth <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the flinty <S%H2496>rock<s%>; He <S%H2015>overturneth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> by the <S%H8328>roots<s%>.
He cutteth <S%H1234>out<s%> <S%H2975>channels<s%> among the <S%H6697>rocks<s%>; And his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> every precious <S%H3366>thing<s%>.
He <S%H2280>bindeth<s%> the <S%H5104>streams<s%> that they <S%H1065>trickle<s%> <S%H8587>not<s%>; And the thing that is hid bringeth he <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%>.
But <S%H370>where<s%> shall <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%>? And where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
Man <S%H582><s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not the <S%H6187>price<s%> <S%H4672>thereof<s%>; Neither is it found in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, It is not in <S%H3220>me<s%>; And the sea <S%H559>saith<s%>, It is not with me.
It cannot be <S%H5414>gotten<s%> for <S%H5458>gold<s%>, Neither shall <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for the price <S%H4242>thereof<s%>.
It cannot be <S%H5541>valued<s%> with the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, With the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, or the <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>.
Gold <S%H2091><s%> and <S%H2137>glass<s%> cannot <S%H6186>equal<s%> <S%H8545>it<s%>, Neither shall it be exchanged for <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>.
No <S%H2142>mention<s%> shall be made of <S%H7215>coral<s%> or of <S%H1378>crystal<s%>: <S%H4901>Yea<s%>, the price of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is above <S%H6443>rubies<s%>.
The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall not <S%H6186>equal<s%> <S%H5541>it<s%>, Neither shall it be valued with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold<s%>.
Whence <S%H370><s%> then <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>? And where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
Seeing it is <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H2416>living<s%>, And kept <S%H5641>close<s%> from the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
Destruction <S%H11><s%> and <S%H4194>Death<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8088>rumor<s%> thereof with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> <S%H995>understandeth<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3045>thereof<s%>, And he knoweth the place <S%H4725>thereof<s%>.
For he <S%H5027>looketh<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And <S%H7200>seeth<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>;
To <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7307>wind<s%>: <S%H8505>Yea<s%>, he meteth out the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure<s%>.
When he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>, And a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the <S%H6963>thunder<s%>;
Then did he <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5608>it<s%>, and declare <S%H3559>it<s%>; He established <S%H2713>it<s%>, yea, and searched it out.

And unto <S%H120>man<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3374>Behold<s%>, the fear of the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, that is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; And to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
